data.scheme_name: Maharashtra State Export Promotion Policy 2023 - Sale of products through e-commerce platforms - Existing
data.benefits:
Scheme will facilitate an initiative by arranging awareness campaign 
and Dak Niryat Kendra of 1 Lakh per consignment limited to one per annum per unit, subject to a budgetary cap of Rs. 100 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All MSMEs who sell their product through E-Commerce platforms in international markets shall be eligible under the scheme.
data.beneficiaries: All MSMEs who sell their product through E-Commerce platforms in international markets shall be eligible under the scheme.
data.nodal_agency: Maharashtra Industry, Trade and Investment Facilitation Cell (MAITRI)
data.context: The Maharashtra State Export Promotion Policy 2023 introduced to develop every district  as an Export hub for balanced regional growth.
data.objective: The Maharashtra Export Promotion Policy 2023 aims to double the stateâ€™s exports to $150 billion by 2030, attract $3.4 billion in FDI, create 40,000 jobs, and develop 30 export-oriented infrastructure projects.
data.description: Scheme provides to MSMEs to sell their product through E-Commerce platforms in international markets of Rs. 1 lakh per consignment limited to one per annum per unit, subject to budgetary cap of   Rs. 100 lakhs.
data.funding_facilitator: Maharashtra Industry, Trade and Investment Facilitation Cell (MAITRI)
data.funding_mechanism: Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority after fulfilment of condition
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (If MSME)
Certificate of Incorporation
Business Details
Detailed Project Report
KYC Documents
Export Details 
Any other documents as required
data.checklist_info_d:
MAITRI 
Krupanidhi Building, 9, Walchand Hirachand Marg, Ballard Estate, Fort, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400038
Email - maitri-mh@gov.in
data.beneficiary: Specified Industries - All Entities - Maharashtra - All MSMEs
